featured.text: Mary lost ten kilograms in three months, so her _____ skin-tight jeans are now hanging off her hips.
Capoeira is also believed to have influenced several dancing styles like breaking and hip-hop.
It is reported that hip-hop fashion alone generates $750 million to $1 billion annually.
Perhaps one of the best examples is their use of hip-hop culture.
What is the best title for this passage? (A) The Importance of Marketing (B) The Power of Youth Culture (C) The Popularity of Hip-hop Fashion (D)

definition.en_def: The hip is the joint or area where the thigh meets the body; it can also refer to being trendy or fashionable.
definition.example: She wore a hip outfit that caught everyone's attention.
